 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package soc.message

Class Summary
AcceptOffer This message means that the player is accepting an offer.
AdminPing This message is a way for the admin to test if a robot is connected and running
AdminReset This message allows the admin to reset a robot player remotely
BankTrade This message means that a player wants to trade with the bank
BCastTextMsg This message contains a text message for everyone connected
BoardLayout This message contains the board layout information.
BoardLayout2 This message contains the board's layout information and its encoding version.
BuildRequest This message, from client to server, says which piece type the current player wants to build.
BuyCardRequest This message means that the player wants to buy a development card.
CancelBuildRequest This message type has three meanings, depending on game state and direction of send.
CardsMessage  
ChangeFace This message says that a player is changing the face icon.
Channels This message lists all the chat channels on a server
ChoosePlayer This message says which player the current player wants to steal from.
ChoosePlayerRequest This message asks a player to choose a player to steal from.
ClearOffer This message means that the player is retracting an offer.
ClearTradeMsg This message means that the server wants the trade message cleared
CreateAccount This message is a request to create an account
DeleteChannel This message means that a chat channel has been destroyed.
DeleteGame This message means that a soc game has been destroyed.
DevCard This message means that a player is drawing or playing a development card
DevCardCount This message says how many development cards are in the deck.
DiceResult This message reports total of what was rolled on the dice.
Discard This message means that a player is discarding
DiscardRequest This message requests that the player discard a particular number of cards
DiscoveryPick This message says which resources the player picked for a Discovery card
EndTurn This message means that a player wants to end the turn
FirstPlayer This message says who the first player is
GameMembers This message lists all the members of a game.
GameOptionGetDefaults Information on current defaults for new games' game options.
GameOptionGetInfos This message from client sends a list of game options to the server.
GameOptionInfo Information on one available game option.
Games This message lists all the soc games currently on a server, without game options.
GameState This message communicates the current state of the game
GameStats This message contains the scores for the people at a game.
GamesWithOptions List of all games currently on the server, including their game options.
GameTextMsg This message contains a text message for a SoC game.
GetStatistics This message is a request to get statistics for humans or robots.
ImARobot This message tells the server that the client is a robot.
Join This message means that someone is joining a channel
JoinAuth This message means that the server has authorized this client to join a channel
JoinGame This message is used to join any existing game (with or without game options).
JoinGameAuth This message means that the player is allowed to join the game this client to join a game
JoinGameRequest This message means that the server is asking this robot client to join a game.
LargestArmy This message says which player has largest army.
LastSettlement This message tells the client where the last settlement was places Used for robots during init set up
Leave This message means that someone is leaveing a channel
LeaveAll This message means that someone is leaving all the channels
LeaveGame This message means that someone is leaveing a game
LongestRoad This message says which player has longest road.
MakeOffer This message means that a player wants to trade with other players
Members This message lists all the members of a chat channel
Message Messages used for game data, events, and chatting on a channel.
MessageMulti Message containing multiple parameters, each of which may have sub-fields.
MessageTemplate0 Template for per-game message types with no parameters.
MessageTemplate1i Template for per-game message types with 1 integer parameter.
MessageTemplate1s Template for per-game message types with 1 string parameter.
MessageTemplate2i Template for per-game message types with 2 integer parameters.
MessageTemplate2s Template for per-game message types with 2 string parameters.
MessageTemplate3s Template for per-game message types with 3 string parameters.
MessageTemplateJoinGame This message means that someone is joining a game.
MessageTemplateMi Template for message types with variable number of integer parameters.
MessageTemplateMs Template for message types with variable number of string parameters.
MonopolyPick This message says what resource the current player wants to monopolize
MoveRobber This message means that a player wants to move the robber
NewChannel This message means that a new chat channel has been created.
NewGame This message to all clients means that a new game has been created.
NewGameWithOptions This broadcast message from server announces a new game, with a certain version and possibly game options, to all clients.
NewGameWithOptionsRequest This message means that client wants to create a new game, with options; needs same username/password options as JOINGAME.
PlayDevCardRequest This message means that a player wants to play a development card
PlayerElement This message conveys one part of the player's status, such as their number of settlements remaining.
PlayerElements This message from the server holds information on some parts of the player's status, such as resource type counts.
PlayerStats Statistics of one type for one player.
PotentialSettlements This message contains a list of potential settlements
PutPiece This message means that a player is asking to place, or has placed, a piece on the board
RejectConnection This message means that a client isn't allowed to connect
RejectOffer This message means that the player is rejecting an offer.
ResetBoardAuth This message from server informs the client that a game they're playing has been "reset" to a new game (with same name and players, new layout), and they should join at the given position.
ResetBoardReject This message from server informs all clients that voting has ended, and the board reset request has been rejected.
ResetBoardRequest This message from client to server requests a "reset board" of a game being played.
ResetBoardVote This bi-directional message gives the client's vote on a "board reset", which was requested by another player in that game.
ResetBoardVoteRequest This message from server informs the client that in a game they're playing, another player requests a "board reset" (new game with same name and players, new layout), and they should vote yes or no.
ResetStatistics This message is a reset statistics for an account
ResourceCount This message has the total resource count for a player
RobberMessage  
RobotDismiss This message means that the server wants the robot who receives this message to leave the game.
RollDice This message means that the player is rolling the dice this client to join a game
RollDicePrompt This message from server informs all players whose turn it is, so they may roll the dice, or take other action allowable at that time.
RollDiceRequest This message requests that the player rolls the dice this client to join a game
ServerPing This is a ping message from the server, or its reply from the client.
SetPlayedDevCard This message sets the flag which says if a player has played a development card this turn
SetSeatLock This message sets the lock state of a seat.
SetTurn This message from server to client says whose turn it is.
SetupDone This message means that all players are done placing their initial settlements.
ShowStatistics This message returns statistics for humans or robots
SitDown This message means that a player wants to sit down to play
SOCVersion This message sends the server's or client's version to the other side of the connection.
StartGame This message means that a player wants to start the game
StatusMessage This is a text message that shows in a status box on the client.
TextMsg This message contains a text message
TraderMessage  
Turn This message from server to client signals end of the current player's turn.
UpdateRobotParams This message means that the robot client needs to update the robot parameters with the contained information
